creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: barefooted standing figure riding on top of a gray sea slug, holding her PL hand up to her forehead and carrying a red and gold cloth wrapped object in her PR hand; figure wears a blue kimono with red, blue, and yellow chrysanthemums with yellow obi and a white and gold handled sword with black and gold sheath; flock of gray and white plovers in the sky in URQ; text in cartouches in URC and LRC
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Toyokuni's Drawings: A Magic Contest (Toyokuni kigō: Kijutsu kurabe 豊国揮毫　奇術競)
title: The actor Sawamura Tanosuke III in the role of the heroine Tsunade (Yūfu Tsunade)
